name: Raspberry Peach Lemonade
description: This raspberry peach lemonade is one of my favorite summer drinks! It's super easy to make and so refreshing! Homemade lemonade is simply the best!

recipeInstructions.text: Pit the peaches and cut them into large chunks. Together with the fresh raspberries and 1 cup of water put them into a blender and process until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Pit the peaches and cut them into large chunks. Together with the fresh raspberries and 1 cup of water put them into a blender and process until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Strain through a fine-mesh sieve into a large pitcher. Add 2 liters of cold water as well as the agave and the juice of one lemon.
recipeInstructions.name: Strain through a fine-mesh sieve into a large pitcher. Add 2 liters of cold water as well as the agave and the juice of one lemon.

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the remaining peach and the lemon into slices and add them together with the raspberries, the fresh mint, and the ice cubes to the lemonade. Enjoy!
